title: KIM SWITCH / END OF DAY
description: Kim wants to call it a day.

dialogueTree.title: You: ""I think I need to talk to the cafe..."
dialogueTree.text: "I think I need to talk to the cafeteria manager about my room..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You certainly have been avoiding i..."

dialogueTree.title: You: ""I haven't paid the cafeteria manag..."
dialogueTree.text: "I haven't paid the cafeteria manager for damages yet."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You should take care of that, then.""
links.text: "You should take care of that, then."

links.title: You: ""I think I have the money now. This..."
links.text: "I think I have the money now. This is money, right?" (Show him re√°l bills.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods. "I'll also take a room at..."
links.text: He nods. "I'll also take a room at the Whirling. One cannot get much closer to the crime scene."

links.title: Empathy: "He's proud of you for getting your..."
links.text: He's proud of you for getting your act together and finding a way to pay back what you owe.

links.title: You: ""But I don't have the money...""
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's talk to him anyway. An offic..."
links.text: "Let's talk to him anyway. An officer of the RCM shouldn't be sleeping in the streets. We'll figure something out."

links.title: Empathy: "Though he finds this situation frus..."
links.text: Though he finds this situation frustrating, he is doing his best to not make you feel any worse than you already do.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We can pick up where we left off t..."
links.text: "We can pick up where we left off tomorrow morning."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's continue tomorrow, bright an..."
links.text: "Let's continue tomorrow, bright and early -- 7:30 sharp. I'll be waiting downstairs."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'll also take a room at the Whirl..."
links.text: "I'll also take a room at the Whirling."

dialogueTree.title: You: ""Then I should check in with the ca..."
dialogueTree.text: "Then I should check in with the cafeteria manager."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do that. I'll be waiting for you d..."
links.text: "Do that. I'll be waiting for you downstairs tomorrow."

dialogueTree.title: You: ""I found lodgings in the village. I..."
dialogueTree.text: "I found lodgings in the village. I'll spend the night there."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good to know. I'll be wherever is..."
links.text: "Good to know. I'll be wherever is necessary in the morning. Bright and early, 7:30 sharp."
